location.zh-cn: 中国广东省潮州市湘桥区西荣路48号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省潮州市的市级广播电视媒体，由潮州人民广播电台及潮州电视台于2004年合并成立。
description.en: A municipal-level radio and television media outlet in Chaozhou, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, formed by the merger of Chaozhou People's Radio Station and Chaozhou Television Station in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台的前身之一，主要提供广播服务。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station, primarily providing radio services.

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台的前身之一，主要提供电视服务。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station, primarily providing television services.

nodes.id: 南方广播影视传媒集团

zh-cn: 南方广播影视传媒集团

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台的上级单位。
description.en: The parent organization of Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

nodes.id: 中国共产党潮州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党潮州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在潮州市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Chaozhou.

nodes.id: 中国共产党潮州市委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党潮州市委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党潮州市委员会的宣传部门，直接主管潮州广播电视台。
description.en: The propaganda department of the CPC Chaozhou Municipal Committee, which directly supervises Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责管理全国广播电影电视事务。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing national radio, film, and television affairs.

description.zh-cn: 于2001年5月8日与潮州电视台合并。
description.en: Merged with Chaozhou Television Station on May 8, 2001.

description.zh-cn: 中国的国家网络电视播出机构。
description.en: China's national web-based television broadcaster.

description.zh-cn: 中国广东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国广东省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Guangdong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家广播电台。
description.en: The national radio station of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The national television broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家对外广播电台。
description.en: The national external radio broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省潮州市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Chaozhou City, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2004年12月8日，潮州人民广播电台与潮州电视台合并，挂牌成立潮州广播电视台。
description.en: On December 8, 2004, Chaozhou People's Radio Station and Chaozhou Television Station merged to establish Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 2004年12月8日，潮州电视台与潮州人民广播电台合并，挂牌成立潮州广播电视台。
description.en: On December 8, 2004, Chaozhou Television Station and Chaozhou People's Radio Station merged to establish Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 2001年5月8日，潮州电视台与潮州有线电视台合并。合并后，潮州有线电视台组建了潮州电视台的第二条电视频道生活经济频道。
description.en: On May 8, 2001, Chaozhou Television Station merged with Chaozhou Cable Television Station. After the merger, Chaozhou Cable Television Station formed the second TV channel of Chaozhou Television Station, the Life and Economy Channel.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

description.zh-cn: 1985年12月，中华人民共和国广播电影电视部批准建立潮州电视台。
description.en: In December 1985, the Ministry of Radio, Film and Television of the People's Republic of China approved the establishment of Chaozhou Television Station.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

description.zh-cn: 1988年8月26日，广播电影电视部批准建立潮州人民广播电台。
description.en: On August 26, 1988, the Ministry of Radio, Film and Television approved the establishment of Chaozhou People's Radio Station.

relationships.target: 南方广播影视传媒集团

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台是南方广播影视传媒集团的下属单位。
description.en: Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station is a subordinate unit of Southern Radio, Film and Television Media Group.

relationships.target: 中国共产党潮州市委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台由中共潮州市委宣传部直接主管。
description.en: Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station is directly supervised by the Propaganda Department of the CPC Chaozhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党潮州市委员会宣传部
relationships.target: 中国共产党潮州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 宣传部是中国共产党潮州市委员会的下属部门。
description.en: The Propaganda Department is a subordinate department of the CPC Chaozhou Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党潮州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台为中共潮州市委直属事业单位。
description.en: Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station is a public institution directly under the CPC Chaozhou Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台是潮州市人民政府的市级广播电视媒体。
description.en: Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station is a municipal-level radio and television media outlet of the Chaozhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 2011年6月21日，潮州广播电视台新闻综合频道和公共频道上线中国网络电视台，为其提供了网络播出平台，扩大了其影响力。
description.en: On June 21, 2011, Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station's news and public channels were launched on China Network Television, which provided an online broadcasting platform and expanded their influence.

description.zh-cn: 2013年起，潮州、汕头、揭阳三市实施电视互相落地措施，汕头有线电视用户可以接收潮州广播电视台的电视频道。
description.en: Since 2013, Chaozhou, Shantou, and Jieyang have implemented mutual television broadcasting access, allowing cable TV users in Shantou to receive channels from Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 2013年起，潮州、汕头、揭阳三市实施电视互相落地措施，揭阳有线电视用户可以接收潮州广播电视台的电视频道。
description.en: Since 2013, Chaozhou, Shantou, and Jieyang have implemented mutual television broadcasting access, allowing cable TV users in Jieyang to receive channels from Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台的广播频率转播中央人民广播电台的《全国新闻联播》节目。
description.en: The radio frequencies of Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station rebroadcast the "National News Hookup" program from China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 潮州广播电视台的电视频道转播中国中央电视台的《新闻联播》节目。
description.en: The television channels of Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station rebroadcast the "Xinwen Lianbo" program from China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 中国国际广播电台的潮州话对外广播会播出潮州广播电视台自制的节目。
description.en: China Radio International's Chaozhou dialect external broadcast airs programs produced by Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 2005年起，潮州广播电视台通过建设中继站、发射塔及转播设施，成功解决了饶平县部分地区难以收听到其节目的问题。
description.en: Starting in 2005, Chaozhou Broadcast Television Station successfully resolved signal reception issues in parts of Raoping County by building relay stations, transmission towers, and rebroadcasting facilities.
